Title: Veterans
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Benjamin Daniel Lobato, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan learns that his dad's life is in danger because he ran Bo Crowder's business while Bo was in prison and ran it into the ground. Raylan turns to an unlikely source to pin a meth lab killing on Boyd Crowder.
